title: Protesters in France challenge economic reforms
text:
Protesters in France challenge economic reforms 2:27pm EDT - 01:54 
Teachers, train conductors and airline controllers walked off the job across France on Thursday, disrupting transport and public services in a test of public anger with President Emmanuel Macron’s reform drive. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Teachers, train conductors and airline controllers walked off the job across France on Thursday, disrupting transport and public services in a test of public anger with President Emmanuel Macron’s reform drive.
